attributes.action: get rid of the newly released London 2012 Olympics logo and call for a national competition to design the London 2012 Olympics logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The latest logo for the London 2012 Olympics logo is unjustifiably expensive, and in the short time it has been released, it has caused a national uproar which cannot continue.  The way to solve this is let the nation's talent decide by a competition that will be open to everyone.  This will reflect the true spirit of the nation instead of a select few.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
